entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
